name: LeoLang
subtitle: A web based solution to pharmacy data entry and analysis
desc: Apoteo is a bespoke data entry and dashboard application, commissioned by Charge Pharmacist at Waitakere Hospital Outpatients Pharamacy.
problem: Collecting pharmacy data by hand is time-consuming and difficult to analyse and report.
solution: A lightweight web based application to handle data entry and a sleek dashboard to facilitate analysis
